version_description:
Added game review feature. Please give us a high five if you like our game!
Fixed a few player reported bugs, many thanks to the folks!

1.Add a moon phase feature that provides a buff effect according to the moon phase
2.Add mooncake recipes which can be shared between different characters
3.Improved game accessibility and performance
4.Bug fixes

1.Add a new storyline, you will face a new threat on your journey
2.Add a new enemy: child soldier and a new location: training camp
3.Add letters and notes which reveals more details of the new storyline
4.Bug fix

We wish you all a happy new year 2018!
DLC 50% off until 2/24

This big update includes:
1. A brand new card progression system that allows you to gather card shards from the game and then upgrades the card to provide additional attributes to your character. Attributes provided by the card take effect for all characters and a new game can immediately get the bonus on attributes
2. Added Chinese New Year red envelopes, from 2018.2.16 to 2018.3.1, player can collect envelopes with card shards every day
3. Added traditional Chinese snacks, can be randomly found through the journey

In addition, we also provide an "Endless Mode" DLC to purchase, which includes:

1. Endless mode made up of random level elements that players can get a lot of card fragments in this mode
2. 5 new characters, including adventurer who gains more experience and brawler who is good at combat

We hope you will enjoy!

***Critical bug fix: now you can access to DLC content after purchase***

Improved UI layout for iPhone X
Fixed a bug that might cause black screen
Added a switch to enable/disable the card system
A few text change and bug fix

1. Five new jobs: Rancher, Programmer, Sommelier, Ascetic, and Athlete.
2. Six new top tier recipes - which set will you choose? A set of expensive, flexible, and formidable Force gear or a set of inexpensive, rigid, and highly defensive Fortified gear?
3. Adjusted amount of shards collected from Endless Mode.
4. Adjusted formulas for calculating Dodge, Critical Hits, Combos, and Block so they increase at a more reasonable rate to approach, but never reach, 100%.
5. Game balancing and text adjustments.
Minor bug fixes to some UI issues related to the new iDevices.
